scripts.postinstall: npm install -g bower && bower install && cd src && npm install
scripts.build-static: npm install && cd src && node_modules/.bin/zwitterion --target ES2015 --build-static --exclude-dirs bower_components graphcool
scripts.graphcool-deploy-development: source ~/prendus-secrets/development-environment-variables && cd src/graphcool && graphcool-framework deploy --target development
scripts.graphcool-deploy-production: source ~/prendus-secrets/production-environment-variables && cd src/graphcool && graphcool-framework deploy --target production
